t: Generic Brand Amazon: Exploring the Potential with FBA
s: November 8, 2024 - ... A FREE consultation is just a phone call away. ... A generic brand on Amazon refers to products sold without a specific brand name or trademark. These items are typically unbranded or carry non-exclusive branding, allowing multiple sellers to offer the same product.

t: Generic, branded or own brand?
s: Hi. A lot of our products over a range of different items are printed in-house by us. Most of these will be generic products with our own designs on. Can I ask: Should they be listed as generic, under the brand name of generic product (ie t-shirt brand) or with our own brand.

t: 21 Generic Brands Owned by Amazon
s: April 18, 2022 - But chances are good that you’ve never heard of many Amazon brands. In recent years, the retail giant has amassed dozens of private brands and other product collections that are exclusive to Amazon — basically, forms of generic brands or house brands.

t: Can you sell generic items on Amazon? - Riverbend Consulting
s: December 18, 2024 - Generic items on Amazon are unbranded items with no recognizable name or logo. Think of them as the “no-name” goods on store shelves—functional but lacking that extra appeal from a trusted brand. Generic items typically come from manufacturers who mass-produce items and sell them in bulk ...

t: Amazon
s: Generic products are unbranded products that do not belong to any identifiable brand, and should use the string “generic” for the brand name field when creating a new listing. If you create a new product listing with the brand name “generic” or its local translation, other sellers won’t ...

t: Amazon has quietly launched an exclusive line of over-the-counter health products
s: February 22, 2018 - Amazon sells branded over-the-counter medications such as Advil, Mucinex and Nicorette as well as options from Perrigo's generic GoodSense brand. Basic Care, Amazon's recently launched exclusive line of Perrigo OTC health products, is a possible challenge to pharmacy retail chains.

t: How to Check Amazon Products for Generic brand? | Help Center | Seller Assistant
s: You would see a "GB" icon next to "like" and "dislike" icons. If you hover over it you will see crucial data why this listing could cause problems with Amazon. Moreover you are able to see if the product belong to "Generic" or "Unknown" brand in our Quick View feature.

t: Why New Sellers Should Build A Generic Brand - Sellbrite
s: June 12, 2018 - When I started out on Amazon, I had a supplier called DBL Distributors. Once I got up and running, I had over 10,000 products for sale. My brand name was generic, which helped me maintain my image of diversity.
